item.description: I have had more than one person express to me that their dogs do not like water/pools. I will not put out pools this meet up group if that's what people would prefer. Please let me know what you guys think. I do not want people not to join the meet up because of the kiddy pools.
item.how_to_find_us: Ask anyone at the front desk!

group.name: The Greater Boston Active Dogs Meetup Group

item.name: Active Dogs Romp & Roll Time!
